_sText:
What do you do in this map? You have to charge the enemy base with the bomb and plant.
How many player slots are in this map? 40
How many players on each team? 20
What's the goal of this map? To have fun and plant the bomb + defend to win.
How long did it take you to make this map? About 5 hours
What is the point of the helicopter? To give it more detail and to understand it.
What is the point of the water? So you cant just charge the castle and because its a moat.
What is the point of the bridge crossing the water? Because you cant have a moat without a draw bridge.
What is the point of the towers? to give you a look out and have shelter.
